titleStmt.title: His Majesties gracious answer to the letter direct from the Privy Council of this his antient kingdom of Scotland, in the present juncture of affairs, is as follows
titleStmt.author: James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at Our Court at Whitehall, the 6th day of October, 1688, And of Our Reign the Fourth Year. By His Majesties Command, Melfort."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
